Hi. Georg and David.

Thanks for your replies.
The classpath-suite might be=
 a good solution. Unfortunately it does not seem
to support Categories, tho=
ug.

I changed my Suite from

@RunWith(Categories.class)
@...=
eCategory(SlowTests.class)
@...({AppTest.class})
public clas=
s SlowTestSuite {
}

To:
@RunWith(ClasspathSuite.class)
@...=
Category(SlowTests.class)
public class SlowTestSuite {
}

Then my "FastTest=
s" are also run, not only the SlowTests.

David, do you think you can imple=
ment Categories in your filtering aka
@ClassnameFilters?

Thanks
B=E5rd
